help:
ðŸ‘‹ Welcome to Fortnite-Item-Notifier! 
Stay on top of the Fortnite Item Shop with real-time alerts for your favorite skins and cosmetics. 
*Available Commands:* 

 /help: Lists commands 
 /create: Creates an user profile if you dont already have one. 
 /start: Sends your unqiue link to track cosmetics. Dont share this link! 
 /rotate: Rotates your unique tracking link
no_command: This bot does not support traditional chatting. Type /help to see available commands
error_creating_user: There was an error creating your user profile, please try again or contact support if this continues
success_creating_user: Successfully created your user profile! Type /start to begin tracking cosmetics.
user_already_exists: A user profile already exists with your telegram ID. Type /start to begin tracking cosmetics!
